snippet: A profile of Katherine Boo, who spent four years writing about a Mumbai slum.
abstract: A profile of Katherine Boo, who spent four years writing about a Mumbai slum.
lead_paragraph: Katherine Boo, the author whose just-published "Behind the Beautiful Forevers" about a Mumbai slum is being called one of the best books on India in a generation, hates publicity, Charles McGrath writes in a profile in The New York Times. She "talks about herself with about as much ease as someone trying to wriggle from a thicket - stopping, pausing, retracing her sentences and looking for a better way out," he writes.
